value.name: Teen nursery worker guilty of raping girl, 3, and sexually abusing 8 others
value.description: A former nursery assistant has been found guilty of carrying out a series of sex attacks on toddlers where he worked. Jayden McCarthy, 18, faces prison after he was convicted of three rapes and 13 sexual assaults by a jury after a two-week trial at Exeter Crown Court.

value.name: Psychology Today
value.description: The current mode of American police work is badly flawed. It costs precious lives and millions of dollars for cities. There is another radically different model for police work that could be easily instituted.

value.name: Teenage nursery apprentice is found guilty of 13 sex attacks on infants and raping a three-year-old girl in his care while he was aged 16 - and now faces 'substantial' jail term
value.description: Jayden McCarthy, then 16, was only caught when a three-year-old girl told her mother McCarthy carried out a serious sex attack on her at family-run Jack and Jill nursery in Torquay, Devon.

value.name: Devon nursery worker found guilty of sexually assaulting children
value.description: Jayden McCarthy accused of attacks in 2019 on seven girls and one boy between ages of two and four

value.name: Missouri lawmakers repeal KC police residency, empower prosecutors in innocence cases

value.name: Torquay nursery worker guilty of sexually abusing nine children
value.description: An apprentice nursery worker has been found guilty of sexually abusing nine children at a playgroup in Torquay. Jayden McCarthy abused his position to carry out a series of serious offences against young children.

video.name: Torquay nursery worker guilty of sexually abusing nine children

value.name: Former Walsall man jailed for drugs offences after going on the run
value.description: A fugitive from Walsall set up shop as a drug dealer in Exeter during four years in which he was on the run from police in the Midlands, a court has heard.

value.name: Missouri House relents on subpoena language, allowing proposed ban on police chokeholds to move forward
value.description: “We’re not giving up on that,” said Rep. David Evans, a West Plains Republican who is a former judge. Action on the crime package came with less than three days left in the Legislature’s ...

value.name: Dave Evans obituary
value.description: My friend Dave Evans, who has died aged 80, was an outstanding guitarist and songwriter who recorded several albums from the early 1970s onwards and toured the UK and Europe as a solo performer, as well as with the band Canton Trigg.
